Name: Power Of Slide
About the game: Gymkhana drifting game inspired by Ken Block's GYMKHANA video series. Drift, complete missions, earn points, unlock new cars and customizations. Try to learn how to drift in a limited space, perform spins and tricks. A set of tasks at each level will not let you get bored, but you will have to work hard to collect all the stars.
Meta Title: Power Of Slide: Jul 19, 2021, ABG and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Power Of Slide? Check out the release date (Jul 19, 2021), developer insights from ABG, and a complete game summary.
